original_title: UFC on Fuel TV 1: Sanchez vs. Ellenberger
overview: UFC on Fuel TV 1: Sanchez vs. Ellenberger was the first UFC event to air exclusively on Fuel TV. It was held on February 15, 2012, at the Omaha Civic Auditorium in Omaha, Nebraska. The main event consisted of Diego Sanchez facing Jake Ellenberger. Ellenberger came into the match on a five fight win streak, four of which ended by stoppage, including one against Jake Shields.
title: UFC on Fuel TV 1: Sanchez vs. Ellenberger
